data.meta_description: View the executive profile of Ken Gillespie, Board Member at Home Group, on Equilar ExecAtlas to see current and past work history and gain access to Ken Gillespie's network of 21 business contacts.
data.text:
Ken has over 33 years of experience in the house building and construction industry. He was Chief Operating Officer and Plc Board Director of Galliford Try before standing down in February 2017. Ken has a wealth of knowledge about the construction and home building sectors as well as property development, including mergers and acquisitions. He is Chair of Homes for Scotland, a Fellow of the Royal Institute of Chartered Surveyors and he was previously Chairman of Construction Scotlandâ€™s Industry Leadership Group.

Source: Home Group on 02/12/2024
